entities.path: Path to save your poco files
entities.project: Path to your CSharp or VB project --Example: C:\Projects\Anything\Anything.csproj
ignores: Array of string with name of tables that must be ignored

imports: Array of string names of imports statements --Ex: System, System.IO, System.Data

pk: Atributes of properties that indicates a PrimaryKey Column --Ex: [Key] or [PrimaryKey]
fk: Atributes of properties that indicates a ForeignKey Column --Ex: [FK] or [ForeignKey]
attributes.oneToOneRelations: Atributes of objects that represents one to one relationship
attributes.oneToManyRelations: Atributes of objects that represents one to many relationship
